meanings.definition: Existing or occurring in two states
meanings.sent1: The bistate sign showed the speed limit for both states.
meanings.sent2: The bistate organization had offices in two different states.
meanings.sent3: The bistate cat enjoyed sunbathing in both windows simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: Her bistate loyalty to both teams made her a unique fan.
meanings.sent5: The bistate river flowed through two states, dividing them.

meanings.definition: Capable of functioning in two states
meanings.sent1: The bistate machine could operate on battery or electricity.
meanings.sent2: The bistate device seamlessly switched between modes.
meanings.sent3: The bistate robot confused everyone by doing two tasks at once.
meanings.sent4: His bistate mindset allowed him to adapt to any situation.
meanings.sent5: The bistate engine powered the vehicle in both modes efficiently.
